text: Dixon is a city in northern Solano County, California, United States. It is about from the state capital, Sacramento. The population was 18,988 at the 2020 census. Other nearby cities include Vacaville, Winters and Davis. ==Famous people== *Jon Pardi (born 1985), country singer == References == Category:1878 establishments in California Category:Cities in California Category:Cities in the San Francisco Bay Area Category:Settlements in Solano County, California
title: Dixon, California
